content: i am but a little bird small and insignificant in the face of the hurricane of history but however much i m buffeted by the winds of chaos i will always do my best to poop on fascists this design was inspired by this bird with the text i poop on fascists 1 from matt adrian/the mincing mockingbird i am fully aware of the ridiculousness of this hat but it helped me channel my frustration and i am sharing it in the hopes that it might give others a laugh the pattern calls for sport weight yarn in the following quantities main colour natural 95 m/104 yards contrast colour 1 blue 65 m/71 yards contrast colour 2 bronze 27 m/30 yards the sample hat was knitted in rauma finullgarn 175m/50g finull is a woollen-spun rustic norwegian yarn that knits up much more robustly and thickly than a worsted-spun merino yarn of the same yardage and weight 1 https //www mincingmockingbird com/collections/troubled-bird/products/poop-on-fascists-magnet
